reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks like it's worth a million dollars and appreciate its perfect fit, with one customer noting it's particularly flattering for pear-shaped figures.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars soo cute!
items.body: was longer than i expected but i am 5 feet so makes sense. the color is so cute and ive gotten a lot of compliments on it Read more
items.author: menucha holman

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ugly
items.body: It looks really nice in the photo which is why I bought it but in actuality it doesn't look good at all! Read more
items.author: CR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the price- buy it!
items.body: Wow! You will NOT be disappointed with this dress. I had it pressed at the cleaner for the wrinkles. I'm 5'7" in 4" inch Stilettos and it was a perfect length. I bought a medium and I'm currently a size 6-8. 34DD, 153lbs for context. Its shapewear friendly too. It has a good amount of stretch. Tons of compliments at a black tie gala. It arrived in 2 days. I'd strongly recommend for a backup gown. When you're a little bloated, or have a lil weight gain, this dress is clutch. Read more
items.author: Vegas Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but size down
items.body: It’s very stretchy so we aware of that, If you want it to be tight to your body order a size down, for the rest it looks great, it’s very lightweight and long! The color is not a bright white, is more like an ivory. Read more
items.author: Mariana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress it fits perfectly. Loved the material and color combination. Read more
items.author: Tanya M Bowden

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too long
items.body: Nice dress but too long. Read more
items.author: Katherine Williams

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fabric was dirty when it arrived.
items.body: When it arrived the fabric was dirty. It had obviously worn by someone before I received it. The style was interesting, but way too much fabric. And it was really long and would have had to be tailored. Read more
items.author: Linda Ribich

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gown for my pear-shaped shorties!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress. I’m 5’3, 170lbs, pear-shaped - and a Medium fit me perfectly. It was so comfortable and light-weight. The skirt swooshes in a way that makes it look more elegant and expensive than it is. A bit long, though! Really should have had it hemmed but I skated by bc my heels were so high. Was stopped all night at the wedding by women complimenting the dress and asking where I got it. Heads up on the sheerness factor of the beige panels, though! Could not wear my thigh-length shape-wear bc it was totally visible. But skin-toned underwear-style shape-wear worked fine! Also, there is padding in the shoulders that would give you a more structured, angular silhouette if you’re thinner/smaller in the arms-collarbone. I’m pretty round so it didn’t do much, but just a heads up! Wish I had a video so you could see the way the skirt moves bc it is SO FUN! Read more
items.author: Kelly M. Convery

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 02black, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
